content:
I want to create some new JIRA trackers, but when I click "Create" it keeps taking me to the "Create account" screen with no options to switch to issue creation. I'm logged into my account.

Any idea how to break out of this cycle so I can submit my trackers?

Thanks!
@Rachel Kutner - Would recommend asking this sort of question here instead: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/184932-JIRA.2FConfluence

Kevin Power said:

Rachel Kutner - Would recommend asking this sort of question here instead: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/184932-JIRA.2FConfluence

Thanks!
